item.title: Apple Pie
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 8-9 small apples
  • 1/3 cup sugar
  • 3/4 cup brown sugar
  • 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
  • 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg
  • 2 tablespoons corn starch
  • 1 tablespoon flour

Directions

  1. mix it all together and bake in a pie
